about_the_game:
Faced with a horrifying tragedy, you must delve into a flowering realm of memories and nightmares to save your dead lover. SYSTEM PURGE - Hollow Point is a challenging, atmospheric, and action-packed 2D platformer.

HOLLOW POINT
Cloned flesh is no substitute; you’ve saved no one real. Hollow Point continues the story of the first System Purge, adding six new surreal sectors to explore. Survive a litany of new obstacles and monstrous threats as you delve into the System’s very foundations…and beyond.

BEARTRAP MODE
After you've finished Hollow Point, tackle the game’s hardest challenge in Beartrap Mode. Play through an alternate story which remixes and redesigns every level from the original game, adding new obstacles, new secrets, and 4 brutally difficult boss encounters.

SPEEDRUN MODE
Put your skills to the test in 2 new speedrun categories. Jumps, deaths, and uncovered secrets are now tracked during each run.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Realistic Violence or Gore, General Mature Content
